summary: A group of friends take refuge in an island hotel that is decorated for New Years. The problem is, it's early summer, and soon enough, even the walls themselves are striking out against them.
cast: Suzy Aitchison|Nikki Brooks|Daniel James|Mark Powley|Catherine Roman|Julian Ronnie|Steve Emerson|Steve Wilsher|Jon Glentoran|Val Graham|David Lyn|Rory Maclean|Nick Dowsett|Steve Edison|Roy Hill|Chas Cronk|Tony Fernandez|Jenny Bayliss|Ian May|Paul Barrett|Victoria Smith
title: Muerte en el a√±o nuevo
